data.message: Good day for allI am BangladeshiI have a plan about world peoplesIf My plan will implementation in the worldsurely,poor population will come dawn...I pleaser to say Facebook to share my plan andsupport me and all.this is our achievement if we respect all man.plan:::::::1 dollar-1 tk - 1 rupi - 1 diner - 1 yean - 1 pound etc.save in a week and collectthis will makes 4 money in evry months.This money will a big found .and we can help poor people'sI am sorry if make mistakesthanks for readplease telecast this planI am .my family . my friends. my country support myplan.....good bye
